text.autoconfig.fabricbridge.title: Fabricbridge Configuration
text.autoconfig.fabricbridge.option.apiH: The IP and port of the API.
text.autoconfig.fabricbridge.option.toke: The token specified in the Matterbridge config.
text.autoconfig.fabricbridge.option.gate: The gateway to send messages to.
text.autoconfig.fabricbridge.option.user: The username to send to the bridge.
Uses the in-game username if left blank.
text.autoconfig.fabricbridge.option.hove: This includes gateway, protocol, and channel information.
